descriptions.content: ‘khor lo, [b]srung ‘khor, ‘khrul ‘khor. Ex: 'Jam dpal zhi drag gi sgo nas bsrung ba zab mo mi shigs rdo rje'i rwa gur (W15517), Bde mchog gi bsrung ‘khor rgyas pa bsgom tshul (W2581), Gdugs dkar ‘khor los bsrung ba’i lam rim (W26811), Gshin rje gshed kyi ‘khrul ‘khor ‘phrin las sgrub pa (W1826).
